duties_responsibilities.duty: Building and deploying Machine Learning (ML) models at a massive scale to serve various use-cases.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to leverage cutting-edge technologies and build ML models.
Coding in Python and SQL, with a focus on ML models around tabular datasets and XGBoost.
Utilizing cloud environments, A/B testing, and statistical analysis in ML model development.
Working with advanced ML concepts and technologies such as AWS, GCP, BigQuery, Databricks, Spark, PyTorch Lightning, MLFLOW, and Optuna.

education_certification.credential: BSc in Computer Science/Engineering or related field with a focus on applied statistics, AI, machine learning or related fields (Master's preferred)
